caption: We came looking for lunch on a Sunday while at the Abraham Lincoln Museum, and many of the restaurants were closed. While we were walking trying to find some place to eat, we found this place, open. We walk in, fast service, great staff, and great food. Definitely recommend if your in town and need a quick bite!
This is one of my favorite restaurants!  Michael is a wonderful host and his wife's meals are delicious!!!
The food was very good, the portion size was adequate. Not oversized by any means.
Always love the food and the people at La Piazza! Great local gem!
Great lunch special!
Delish. We ordered two pizzas which were excellent, hot, and fast. Also had the lemon chicken soup, which was super good too. Highly recommend.

This has become our local Italian place in Springfield. It’s not a large menu and each month there is a list of specials true to their menu. Short of some places in St. Louis, you can have a great meal. Don’t be afraid to ask about menu items, if the wait staff doesn’t know the owner will gladly help.
Excellent pizza with crispy crust because of their special grill.  Love this!
Some of the kindest folks around. My go to is the Vesuvio pizza with a cannoli.
WOW! Some of the highest quality Italian food I’ve ever had!

I had the cannelloni and a piece of chocolate cake and both were delicious, served with warm homemade bread. Ordered to go because of covid and the couple that checked me out (I'm guessing the owners) were incredibly friendly. I'll definitely be back.

1st time here, nice place in downtown Springfield. Staff very friendly. They had a casual side with a few booths and a walk up counter for carry outs. Then the next room is a nice dinning area. 1st impression is good. Seated and given menus, drink orders placed. Menu is nice with the main options being pasta dishes or what appears to be nice hand tossed pizzas. Orders placed, food received. My thoughts as they brought out the salad was they put a lot into a small bowl. The main course looked and tasted really good. As a side note the portion sizes are probably what you should be receiving, a regular size (not large) serving. Food & service was great but not nearly as good as the cannoli cake. Definitely give this place a try.

We were in town for a mini getaway and we’re more than likely to drive 4 hours for another delicious meal! Service was over the top! (Caprese Salad, Spaghetti Della Casa, Lasagna Della Nonna, Linguini Alfredo, Trapanese, for Dessert; Original Cheesecake with fresh strawberries, Blueberry Lemon Cheesecake and Pistachio Layer Cake 🤤) everything was delicious. Well done. Thank you!

Great Italian,The only bummer is you have to eat out on the street. Because of Covid they have decided to close their dining room. That was a turn off for us but we did en joy pizza,Salad, raviolis, and the tiramisu was very good
Great atmosphere, food and service
Great pizza, great service 😁😄❤
Excellent Food.  Reasonable prices.

I've eaten here so many times that I actually invited a friend who is Italian and a chef to make sure I wasn't crazy. Nope. It is indeed delicious and legit Italian food and so reasonably priced, you might doubt the quality... Don't. It is, in fact, the best Italian food in Springfield. Simple, fresh, and light. The flavors of each dish delight the senses and the service is warm and friendly. There is no pretension when you eat with a friend, which is exactly what this feels like.
Great food and friendly staff

My wife took me here for my birthday dinner, and it might have to become my birthday spot! They had fresh burrata (which was a special at the time) and it was the best I've had. The pizza was super good. Highly recommend.

I was so excited to try the pizza carbonara. I travel regularly and always research the restaurants I eat at while I visit. I made a 6:30 reservation for 3. When we showed up, we sat ourselves after waiting for a bit for one of the 3 people working who walked by us to acknowledge us. They never did so we sat down at a table that said reserved and was set for 3. We waited and waited for one of the 3 servers to stop by our table. We never even got menus. We looked on our phones at the menu and decided to just keep waiting. Servers passed us every couple minutes. (2 girls and 1 man). They avoided ever making eye contact or talking to us at all. We thought maybe at some point someone would tell us they would be with us shortly. There were 7 other tables seated divided among the 3 servers. Clearly they were busy so we were patient and kept waiting. After a full 20 minutes and a phone call to Saputos to make a reservation there, we walked out. We walked by 1 of the female servers who had walked by us 10 times atleast and she still never even made eye contact or said a word. I get being busy and am always happy to be patient and wait. No acknowledgement what so ever is inexcusable. A simple "we will be with you shortly" in a 20 minute time frame would have been all it took.
Delish!!!!
Excellent lunch! Minesteone soup - delish plus the bread was perfectly crusty with soft inside! Will be going again soon!

This is my favorite restaurant downtown. The food is amazing. I've tried it all, pizza,pasta you name it. The carbonara is so rich and delicious. The Vesuvius pizza is great (I get it with a couple eggs on it). The bruschetta is always fresh and a very way to start your meal.
Pizza and Salad were AMAZING!! Very friendly staff we will be back again and again!!
Omg the food was great

It was our first time trying LaPiazza and we had a gift certificate to use. As soon as we walked in the door, the two employees working were so nice and friendly. The gentleman who waited on us (the manager, I think) was even offering suggestions for us to do things downtown since our park plans were canceled because of the rain. Our takeout was right on time and we had one of the most delicious meals ever! Their ravioli with the mushroom and tomato cream sauce was amazing! We will definitely be back!!!!!
Really fun pizza choices, tasted great, reasonable prices, beautiful presentation
Good and reasonable price!very good service too!

Food was expensive for what we got. My dish was full of pesto and a couple if slices of red pepper, not a lot of flavor. I ordered chicken with it and there were maybe 5 small flat pieces. First time we thought we'd try it,  We will not be ordering again.
Great food, great service. My coworkers and I love going here for lunch. My husband loves the pizza crust.
So

Called to place a to go order, I wanted two pizzas, pasta and an 2 appetizers. The guy who answered got annoyed when I wanted to customize my pizza, he rushed me through ordering the pizzas then quickly gave me a total before I could place the rest of my order. When I told him I wasn’t done he said “ I can’t do this right now, we’re getting a lunch rush and are very busy right now. I’ll have to call you back in 45 minutes when the lunch rush is over.” I was shocked. He took my number down and hung up. Granted he did try to call back in an hour but I was so offended and embarrassed I didn’t answer. They made me feel like I was inconveniencing them by calling and trying to make a fairly expensive order. As though my business wasn’t good enough for them. I was excited to try the place for the first time but now I will never go there.

Five of us went to an early dinner last Friday and told our server we had theater tickets at the Hoogland. We made it through dinner with plenty of time to spare. Overall the meal was good, the bread was delicious, and the desserts were even better. One problem was that I ordered spaghetti carbonara,  but what was served was spaghetti with a red sauce.  I sent it back, and eventually received what I ordered. The surprising thing was our server didn't recognize that what he served wasn't what had been ordered. The two dishes look nothing alike. We'll give it another try .

I can believe I didn't get any photos but I had a great pizza margarita there.  Very fresh, sauce with mozzarella and basil.  The crust was perfect a little crunchy and chewy.  I was visiting a friend in Springfield and had just stopped in for a quick bite.  I hope to go back and try some pasta and desserts. Promise to get photos next time, LOL.

First time for dinner and was very happy with our selections. I had the lasagna and my husband had the cannelloni; both were excellent! The sauce very much reminded me of my aunt's - delicious. Will definitely return with our family.
Tasty inexpensive lunch.  Pizza was a brick oven type pizza that had delicious and fresh toppings.  Salad was good with balsamic vinaigrette.

Definitely worth a visit if you are willing to brave downtown traffic for lunch. The lunch menu was affordable and the portion size was good for the price. The spaghetti and meatballs and cream of potato soup I ordered even came with some delicious fresh baked bread! The thing that topped it all off though was the black cherry gelato I got for a dessert, it was super satisfying and perfect. The staff was super friendly and attentive as well. We intend to come back and try the dinner menu in the future.
Love everything here. The staff is very friendly, unlimited refills, and large portion sizes. A "slice" of pizza is at least 1/4 of a pizza. My favorite place to eat in Springfield so far.
Good tasted very fresh. Good 2 for $10 lunch is a good deal
Love this place! Foods is delicious and the owners are lovely people.
The staff is very friendly. I really like their vegetable soup, its like mom's home made vegetable soup . I would not say this place is cheap but price is pretty reasonable
Great value in the heart of Springfield. Comfortable and excellent, unpretentious offerings. Good people too. Give it a try for a simple yet delightful experience.
Really delicious food and very reasonable prices, the gluten free pasta was just as phenomenal as the regular
Amazing food and service
Service was slow.
Great pizza

I think I should've looked at the pictures rather than read the reviews before going. I was really excited about fig and prosciutto pizza but what I got was a layer of cheese thicker than the crust. And not even cheesy. Really took away from any flavor. The polpette appetizer was good I just wish it was brought out hotter. It was lukewarm. Bread it came with was really really good. The meatballs are the reason this was a 3 and not a 2. Drinks are very reasonably priced. Service was great and friendly.

I'm gonna be honest with you folks. The pizza was flavorless. The cashier was friendly and sorta helpful with me picking my choice of drink. It was near closing time so I dont blame them for not having many food options however I ordered a two sausage pizzas and a drink that cost me $11. it sounded too expensive but the slices where pretty big. it was unfortunate that I couldn't taste anything! the cheese was a bit gummy and had a lot of grease on top of it. I came for the food and left unsatisfied.

We have been here several times on Saturdays for lunch. The service is great, the food came out quickly and was hot and delicious. The pizza and pasta are both very good. This is a place we will continue to visit!
We had Great spaghetti and pizza.  Service was fast and friendly.  Great lunch combos and very affordable.  Must stop in if downtown SPRINGFIELD, IL.
Very nice.  We had wine and pizzas during Rt 66 car show.  Sat outside.  We were waited on fast and lodged out all.
This place is really awesome a gem in springfield affordable prices, good quality

I would give more than 5 stars if I could! Food is delicious and service is amazing, I was visiting from out of town and staying in a building nearby. We ended up having lunch the first day, went back the next day for more lunch, and then the day before we left we had dinner. The pizza came out super quick and was perfectly cooked, the linguine alfredo was perfect, and served with really good hot bread. The staff is extremely courteous and was very helpful when we didn’t know what to pick, they offered wonderful suggestions. I will definitely be coming back here on my next visit to Springfield!

I was in Springfield over the weekend and stopped in for lunch with my family. Service was great, everyone was friendly, and the food was absolutely delicious. We had the Mediterranean Salad and Vesuvio Pizza. It was so good and the prices were very reasonable.
Excellent food! They have nice lunch selections. Service is fast!
Great food and good service.

For being in the center of Illinois, La Piazza is not a bad spot for Italian cuisine. The meatballs were very tender in a sweet and savory red sauce. Carbonara was good. Service was little choppy, even during a non-busy time of day.
Loved the atmosphere. Food was lovely. All the staff were very accommodating.
I was in Sprinfield Saturday and stopped at this place. I ordered a pizza and it was very delicious and the service was excellent.
Great food and service.
Delicious pasta and a great server!

Great place!  The chicken pesto sandwich is excellent.  The pesto is homemade and is a very tasty recipe.  The pizza and salads are very good too.  The mozzarella on the pizza is not the fake, waxy stuff--it's the real thing.  Good-sized portions, including drink.  Service is good, and they have outside seating, weather permitting.
Food is fresh and  well made. Frequent visitor always try something different. Never a bad expirience

(Translated by Google) What to say!!! Patrizia was simply fantastic! He welcomed us into his room as if we had known each other for a lifetime and made us feel at home. This is the spirit of us Italians. As for the food, the tomato bruschetta were simply amazing .... like those of our beloved south. The pasta? Very good; not to mention the pizza bread then .... super wow !!! Unfortunately we did not have a chance to taste the pizza, because we were full (the portions were like those made by our mothers 😂😂😂) but it was very inviting. We strongly advise you to enter this place and taste the Italian taste.  (Original) Che dire!!! Patrizia è stata semplicemente fantastica! Ci ha accolti nel suo locale come se ci conoscessimo da una vita e ci ha fatti sentire a casa. Questo è lo spirito di noi italiani. Per quanto riguarda il cibo le bruschette al pomodoro erano semplicemente strepitose....come quelle del nostro amato sud. La pasta? Mooolto buona; per non parlare del pane pizza poi....super wow!!! Purtroppo non abbiamo avuto modo di assaggiare la pizza, perché eravamo pieni (le porzioni erano come quelle che fanno le nostre mamme 😂😂😂) ma era molto invitante. Vi consigliamo assolutamente di entrare in questo locale e di assaporare il gusto italiano.
Excellent.  I was walking downtown Springfield and wanted something to snack on.  Excellent choice.  Pizza is great
Great place to eat
Yummy food!
Incredible food that is made in the kitchen from scratch. Very friendly staff. Awesome, reasonably-priced, and memorable.

Great pizza! We had the Fig and prosciutto and it was delicious. We've had a hard time finding a good pizza place in Springfield and this is going to be my new go-to spot.   The Mediterranean salad was very good. Everything is priced very reasonably.
Mediocre food and waiters. Friendly environment, but wouldn't chose to go there again.
Had a honeymoon in Italy and I can confidently say this is the most authentic Italian food in Springfield.
Very excellent pizza
Friendly service. Nice atmosphere. But most important, the food is delicious!
The food is great the service is awesome. I just had lunch and I will be coming for dinner. Very close to most tourists attractions. Worth it. You won regret it.
Walking distance from the Visitors Center and Old State Capitol. Good size portions. Clean, air conditioned, casual restaurant. Menu prices are fair.
Good food just enough for lunch

Fantastic food. Phenomenal service. Seriously, one of the best places we found in Springfield. They serve pastas, pizzas, and salads; all the usual suspects of a little Italian joint. Great appetizers and complementary bread. Prices are very reasonable.
Friendly staff and delicious pizza!

The food is awesome nice selection of wine and beer , great tiramisu and key lime cheese cake. And great attentive service And the pizza is delicious you can buy it by the slice at lunch time and this is a new York still slice, huge

This was the worst experience I have had at any Springfield restaurant.  You order and pay before the food comes out, like Pie's the Limit - or at least we did.  However other tables were ordering from the table.  I am not sure why.  We then waited 30 minutes for our food to come out and were completely ignored by the staff the whole time.  Meanwhile many other tables that came in after us were getting their food.  Then I went back to the counter I ordered at to ask what was taking so long, and to refill my own drink, though other tables were being brought drinks by servers. ~5 minutes later the manager came over and said it was a problem with their printer that had delayed our food.  Another 10 or so minutes and our food came out (so this is about 45 minutes after paying).  The pizza crust was way too thick, undercooked, and soggy.  The pasta was fine but nothing special. No one came to ask us how it was, and in fact we were once again ignored until we left.  No reparations were made for the fact that we waited three times longer than the other customers.  This is not the type of service I expect anywhere, but especially when paying over $30 for two people to eat.
Delicious!
Clean, affordable. Worth coming here and spending your afternoon with friends and/or family. Very friendly customer service and the food is AMAZING!!!!!
Food is fresh and wholesome, wait staff friendly, and the overall vibe stylish without being pretentious.
Very authentic Italian. Best I've had in years. Will be back often. Their Italian bread melts in your mouth. Had half Alfredo and half red sauce on linguini and both were excellent!
Some of the best italian in town.  Reasonable prices.  Very friendly staff and owners.
1st time,  can't wait to come back, great atmosphere, quality ingredients, great food, friendly welcoming staff.  I had a salad for lunch, it was fabulous!
Excellent customer service & hospitably. The lunch menu is an awesome deal. Great food!
Had the seafood pizza. Highly recommended. I will be returning.
Very reasonable prices but small portions.  Great meatballs too!  Wish it was full service and could order sitting down.
Great food and atmosphere! Also very affordable for a party of 4.
This pasta dish is excellent! The staff was really welcoming. The prices are reasonable and they use high quality ingredients.

We stumbled into La Piazza the day after Thanksgiving, when everything else was closed. I'm so glad we did! The food was excellent! The chef and her son are Italian and brought their recipes to Springfield. Our table had pizza and calazone. The pizza was authentic, the tomato sauce were very good, the calazone was flavorful without being heavy. And the service was fantastic! Very attentive and kind people own La Piazza.
Best pizza I have had in Springfield.
Every single person was beyond friendly, helpful, and went above and beyond for us. The prices were amazing, and the food was so fresh and incredibly delicious! We will be back soon!
Food was great and friendly staff. Highly recommend the Braccio di Ferro pizza.
Food was good dessert was good also. I would definitely eat here again I just wish that they had servers
I got lose and found this place. REALLY AMAZING food. If you are reading this don’t look anywhere else come here!!!!
Amazing italian food!
Great food and friendly service! 10/10, will go again.
This is my recommendation: The pesto chicken pasta
The food was very reasonably priced and very delicious

Wow! What a sensuous feast that my friends and I enjoyed on two outings this summer. The food is delicious and flavorful, visually appealing and plentiful. The way in which they prepare and set out the food creates the feeling of being at some small Sicilian-Italian ristorante. The owners have a great sense of hospitality and are very welcoming and accommodating. I am eager to return with others to experience this cool new place in Springfield!

After spending 3 years in Sicily and being from a Sicilian Family, I felt like I was home. I was able to speak Italian, enjoy the food and had an absolutely wonderful meal.  The ambiance could use a little work, but I rate these folks a FIVE!!! Mi Piace multo!!!! Jim from Orlando I forgot to add that the pane'de casa e bellisima.  Tutti fresco!!! Salute

Went to this place expecting a nice Italian restaurant and almost walked out after we realized it was more like a fazolies. But we decided to give it a shot because we were kinda in a hurry that night and thought it would be fast but we were very wrong. We waited almost an hour to get out food which was just pasta and when we get the food it's about the same quality as something you get at fazolies. Don't think I'll be coming back

Ziti Bolonaise was watery and tasteless.  Pizza was oily, had poor flavor and sauce had little flavor.  Parmesan cheese was just the powder style.  Staff never checked back in with us to find out how things were.

Great ambiance,  good food, a welcoming owner and best part, the prices have taxs included. Perhaps better advertising would see this restaurant as one of the best lunch spots in downtown springfield.

I am in love with this place!  The carbonara is the best I've had since Paris in 2007. I've had it twice so it wasn't a one-time thing. I've tried the lasagna, which normally I don't like, and it was good. The staff is amazingly friendly. And the envionment/ambiance is terrific. There isn't anything I don't love.  And my picky 8-year-old thought his cheese pizza was the best ever.
The food was absolutely delicious and the servers/managers were extremely kind and welcoming. Highly recommend if you are in the Springfield area!
If you want a real taste of Italy you should visit La Piazza. Family oriented customized pizza and pasta.... Delicious..... Da vero Italiano
Homemade noodles and sauces make all the difference!  Phenomenal prices!  Worth any hassle with parking downtown :-)
Walked in and then right out.  Noon and nobody in the place.   I was greeted by an employee who seemed would rather be getting a root canal.
The food is fantastic.I love the pizza.we have been there three times,will be back.

Not an 8.00 salad for sure - made it with the wrong lettuce(not as on menu) - no salad dressing.  Could of been good if they took the time and made the salad correct and cared about what they put out for people to eat.
Best Lasagna in Springfield.  Pizza, pasta, dessert, everything is amazing.

New restaurant downtown!  Yeah!  Thanks to the SJR food review decided to check it out on a weeknight because Friday nights are CRAZY in Springfield!  Started with the Caprese appetizer.  Loved the creamy burrata and arugula on crostinis!  I ordered the fig and prosciutto pizza - mozzarella cheese and arugula on top - Yumm!  Dessert - Tiramisu - of course!  Looking forward to our next dinner at La Piazza!

Very fresh and very authentic Italian food! The owner was incredibly nice and offered great suggestions. The desserts were delicious and were my favorite part! Definitely recommend the bruschetta and the tiramisu.
Very great food, reasonably priced. The owner is very nice and serves authentic food.
Great food and atmosphere and very reasonably priced.  Great service that was fast and employees were very courteous.  This is a great place to go in downtown Springfield.

Pizza was amazing and delish! I recommend the eggplant ,red bell pepper and zucchini pizza . All veggies.my favs. Great for summer! The small raspberry tart treat was very tasty and  melted in my mouth.lots of different pasta or pizza choices plus treats to try.i went on a Sunday. Not crowded then

Extremely long wait. Food was bland. They ran out of cheese and communicated this to us this 30 minutes AFTER waiting for our pizza and pasta.. how do you run out of cheese and you consider yourself and Italian restaurant ? Total wait time was almost an hour. We ordered bruschetta, a pizza and two pasta entrees for a party of 2.  All the food arrived at the same time. I thought the bruschetta was an appetizer? The bruschetta was very oily and garlicky and had no cheese. Very disappointing. Do not waste your money.
Good new Italian place
